protocol.description: The protocol used to send events to this hook.

apis.description: The list of APIs to subscribe to. Valid values are: `'vehicle'`, `'transport'`.

hookUrl.description: The URL of the webhook events will be sent to.

topicName.description: The name of the AWS SNS topic that serves this hook. This can be used to verify incoming requests.

topicArn.description: The ARN of the AWS SNS topic that serves this hook. This can be used to verify incoming requests.
